creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE: an amazing 3D experience where you can meet people, chat & dress up! Decorate and design your home and visit astonishing, paradise locations!

Simulation and role playing game with countless possibilities!

It’s an exciting and vibrant virtual world! A second life where you can become the person you always wanted to be.
Create your avatar and join millions of other people who already downloaded this fun role playing game!

Dress up your avatar, design and decorate your home. Buy new clothes, discover new, amazing brands and create your own perfect outfit. Be a fashion star and the centre of attention. Go to parties in paradise locations. Show off your dream home. Message new friends. Explore this ever-growing virtual reality 3D world of AVAKIN LIFE now!

CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR
• Role playing game and simulation where you can choose your perfect character, figure, hair, eye colour and many more!
• Dress up your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and become the person you always wanted to be in your wildest dreams!
• Virtual reality world and simulation that gives you endless opportunities to express yourself!

MEET PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Chat game where you can socialize with millions of other people!
• Meet people from all around the world
• Chat with other players, make new friends and find your crew!
• Show off your perfect outfits and get advice on the newest trends, best styles, and clothes from your friends.
• Compete with millions of other players or explore all the amazing brands and outfits together!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share them on Facebook or Instagram!

STYLE THE PERFECT YOU
• Express yourself with awesome Avakin clothing brands and accessories
• Browse through hundreds of fabulous items and fill your closet with stylish outfits.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion.
• Shop for dresses, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change your hairstyles or even get a tattoo!
• Be a fashion star or model – the choice is yours!

DESIGN YOUR HOME
• Design and build your perfect apartment
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, or Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Invite friends over, organize unforgettable parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual reality world where you can become the person you always wanted to be!
• Chat and meet with thousands of people
• Create your perfect second life!
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion star or a model.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new awesome brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role Playing game with dozens of exciting locations! Go to clubs, the beach and many more places!
• Explore beautifully designed scenes and dive into the amazing world of Avakin Life NOW!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Please continue to send questions, suggestions and ideas to http://www.avakin.com/forums/.

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/

• See a small clock icon next to certain Avakin's names? This appears when a player is in a scene but busy with something else - like shopping in the Avakin Store or updating their style.
• Enjoy a refreshed friends screen!

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

container.value:
Lockwood Publishing Ltd
Antenna Media Centre
Beck Street
Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE: an amazing 3D experience where you can meet people, chat & dress up! Decorate and design your home and visit astonishing, paradise locations!

Simulation and role playing game with countless possibilities!

It’s an exciting and vibrant virtual world! A second life where you can become the person you always wanted to be.
Create your avatar and join millions of other people who already downloaded this fun role playing game!

Dress up your avatar, design and decorate your home. Buy new clothes, discover new, amazing brands and create your own perfect outfit. Be a fashion star and the centre of attention. Go to parties in paradise locations. Show off your dream home. Message new friends. Explore this ever-growing virtual reality 3D world of AVAKIN LIFE now!

CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR
• Role playing game and simulation where you can choose your perfect character, figure, hair, eye colour and many more!
• Dress up your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and become the person you always wanted to be in your wildest dreams!
• Virtual reality world and simulation that gives you endless opportunities to express yourself!

MEET PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Chat game where you can socialize with millions of other people!
• Meet people from all around the world
• Chat with other players, make new friends and find your crew!
• Show off your perfect outfits and get advice on the newest trends, best styles, and clothes from your friends.
• Compete with millions of other players or explore all the amazing brands and outfits together!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share them on Facebook or Instagram!

STYLE THE PERFECT YOU
• Express yourself with awesome Avakin clothing brands and accessories
• Browse through hundreds of fabulous items and fill your closet with stylish outfits.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion.
• Shop for dresses, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change your hairstyles or even get a tattoo!
• Be a fashion star or model – the choice is yours!

DESIGN YOUR HOME
• Design and build your perfect apartment
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, or Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Invite friends over, organize unforgettable parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual reality world where you can become the person you always wanted to be!
• Chat and meet with thousands of people
• Create your perfect second life!
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion star or a model.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new awesome brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role Playing game with dozens of exciting locations! Go to clubs, the beach and many more places!
• Explore beautifully designed scenes and dive into the amazing world of Avakin Life NOW!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Please continue to send questions, suggestions and ideas to https://avakin.com/community/

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

container.value:
Lockwood Publishing Ltd
Antenna Media Centre
Beck Street
Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE: an amazing 3D experience where you can meet people, chat & dress up! Decorate and design your home and visit astonishing, paradise locations!

Simulation and role playing game with countless possibilities!

It’s an exciting and vibrant virtual world! A second life where you can become the person you always wanted to be.
Create your avatar and join millions of other people who already downloaded this fun role playing game!

Dress up your avatar, design and decorate your home. Buy new clothes, discover new, amazing brands and create your own perfect outfit. Be a fashion star and the centre of attention. Go to parties in paradise locations. Show off your dream home. Message new friends. Explore this ever-growing virtual reality 3D world of AVAKIN LIFE now!

CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR
• Role playing game and simulation where you can choose your perfect character, figure, hair, eye colour and many more!
• Dress up your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and become the person you always wanted to be in your wildest dreams!
• Virtual reality world and simulation that gives you endless opportunities to express yourself!

MEET PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Chat game where you can socialize with millions of other people!
• Meet people from all around the world
• Chat with other players, make new friends and find your crew!
• Show off your perfect outfits and get advice on the newest trends, best styles, and clothes from your friends.
• Compete with millions of other players or explore all the amazing brands and outfits together!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share them on Facebook or Instagram!

STYLE THE PERFECT YOU
• Express yourself with awesome Avakin clothing brands and accessories
• Browse through hundreds of fabulous items and fill your closet with stylish outfits.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion.
• Shop for dresses, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change your hairstyles or even get a tattoo!
• Be a fashion star or model – the choice is yours!

DESIGN YOUR HOME
• Design and build your perfect apartment
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, or Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Invite friends over, organize unforgettable parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual reality world where you can become the person you always wanted to be!
• Chat and meet with thousands of people
• Create your perfect second life!
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion star or a model.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new awesome brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role Playing game with dozens of exciting locations! Go to clubs, the beach and many more places!
• Explore beautifully designed scenes and dive into the amazing world of Avakin Life NOW!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Please continue to send questions, suggestions and ideas to https://avakin.com/community/

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

container.value:

NG1 1EQ

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE: an amazing 3D experience where you can meet people, chat & dress up! Decorate and design your home and visit astonishing, paradise locations!

Simulation and role playing game with countless possibilities!

It’s an exciting and vibrant virtual world! A second life where you can become the person you always wanted to be.
Create your avatar and join millions of other people who already downloaded this fun role playing game!

Dress up your avatar, design and decorate your home. Buy new clothes, discover new, amazing brands and create your own perfect outfit. Be a fashion star and the centre of attention. Go to parties in paradise locations. Show off your dream home. Message new friends. Explore this ever-growing virtual reality 3D world of AVAKIN LIFE now!

CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR
• Role playing game and simulation where you can choose your perfect character, figure, hair, eye colour and many more!
• Dress up your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and become the person you always wanted to be in your wildest dreams!
• Virtual reality world and simulation that gives you endless opportunities to express yourself!

MEET PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Chat game where you can socialize with millions of other people!
• Meet people from all around the world
• Chat with other players, make new friends and find your crew!
• Show off your perfect outfits and get advice on the newest trends, best styles, and clothes from your friends.
• Compete with millions of other players or explore all the amazing brands and outfits together!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share them on Facebook or Instagram!

STYLE THE PERFECT YOU
• Express yourself with awesome Avakin clothing brands and accessories
• Browse through hundreds of fabulous items and fill your closet with stylish outfits.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion.
• Shop for dresses, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change your hairstyles or even get a tattoo!
• Be a fashion star or model – the choice is yours!

DESIGN YOUR HOME
• Design and build your perfect apartment
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, or Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Invite friends over, organize unforgettable parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual reality world where you can become the person you always wanted to be!
• Chat and meet with thousands of people
• Create your perfect second life!
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion star or a model.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new awesome brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role Playing game with dozens of exciting locations! Go to clubs, the beach and many more places!
• Explore beautifully designed scenes and dive into the amazing world of Avakin Life NOW!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Please continue to send questions, suggestions and ideas to https://avakin.com/community/

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

container.value:
Lockwood Publishing Ltd
Antenna Media Centre
Beck Street
Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE: an amazing 3D experience where you can meet people, chat & dress up! Decorate and design your home and visit astonishing, paradise locations!

Simulation and role playing game with countless possibilities!

It’s an exciting and vibrant virtual world! A second life where you can become the person you always wanted to be.
Create your avatar and join millions of other people who already downloaded this fun role playing game!

Dress up your avatar, design and decorate your home. Buy new clothes, discover new, amazing brands and create your own perfect outfit. Be a fashion star and the centre of attention. Go to parties in paradise locations. Show off your dream home. Message new friends. Explore this ever-growing virtual reality 3D world of AVAKIN LIFE now!

CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR
• Role playing game and simulation where you can choose your perfect character, figure, hair, eye colour and many more!
• Dress up your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and become the person you always wanted to be in your wildest dreams!
• Virtual reality world and simulation that gives you endless opportunities to express yourself!

MEET PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Chat game where you can socialize with millions of other people!
• Meet people from all around the world
• Chat with other players, make new friends and find your crew!
• Show off your perfect outfits and get advice on the newest trends, best styles, and clothes from your friends.
• Compete with millions of other players or explore all the amazing brands and outfits together!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share them on Facebook or Instagram!

STYLE THE PERFECT YOU
• Express yourself with awesome Avakin clothing brands and accessories
• Browse through hundreds of fabulous items and fill your closet with stylish outfits.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion.
• Shop for dresses, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change your hairstyles or even get a tattoo!
• Be a fashion star or model – the choice is yours!

DESIGN YOUR HOME
• Design and build your perfect apartment
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, or Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Invite friends over, organize unforgettable parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual reality world where you can become the person you always wanted to be!
• Chat and meet with thousands of people
• Create your perfect second life!
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion star or a model.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new awesome brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role Playing game with dozens of exciting locations! Go to clubs, the beach and many more places!
• Explore beautifully designed scenes and dive into the amazing world of Avakin Life NOW!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Please continue to send questions, suggestions and ideas to https://avakin.com/community/

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/

Lockwood Publishing Ltd
Antenna Media Centre
Beck Street
Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE: an amazing 3D experience where you can meet people, chat & dress up! Decorate and design your home and visit astonishing, paradise locations!

Simulation and role playing game with countless possibilities!

It’s an exciting and vibrant virtual world! A second life where you can become the person you always wanted to be.
Create your avatar and join millions of other people who already downloaded this fun role playing game!

Dress up your avatar, design and decorate your home. Buy new clothes, discover new, amazing brands and create your own perfect outfit. Be a fashion star and the centre of attention. Go to parties in paradise locations. Show off your dream home. Message new friends. Explore this ever-growing virtual reality 3D world of AVAKIN LIFE now!

CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR
• Role playing game and simulation where you can choose your perfect character, figure, hair, eye colour and many more!
• Dress up your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and become the person you always wanted to be in your wildest dreams!
• Virtual reality world and simulation that gives you endless opportunities to express yourself!

MEET PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Chat game where you can socialize with millions of other people!
• Meet people from all around the world
• Chat with other players, make new friends and find your crew!
• Show off your perfect outfits and get advice on the newest trends, best styles, and clothes from your friends.
• Compete with millions of other players or explore all the amazing brands and outfits together!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share them on Facebook or Instagram!

STYLE THE PERFECT YOU
• Express yourself with awesome Avakin clothing brands and accessories
• Browse through hundreds of fabulous items and fill your closet with stylish outfits.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion.
• Shop for dresses, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change your hairstyles or even get a tattoo!
• Be a fashion star or model – the choice is yours!

DESIGN YOUR HOME
• Design and build your perfect apartment
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, or Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Invite friends over, organize unforgettable parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual reality world where you can become the person you always wanted to be!
• Chat and meet with thousands of people
• Create your perfect second life!
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion star or a model.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new awesome brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role Playing game with dozens of exciting locations! Go to clubs, the beach and many more places!
• Explore beautifully designed scenes and dive into the amazing world of Avakin Life NOW!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Please continue to send questions, suggestions and ideas to https://avakin.com/community/

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/
descriptionShort: Meet new people and chat with friends in the largest 3D simulation game.

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

container.value:
Lockwood Publishing Ltd
Antenna Media Centre
Beck Street
Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Discover new dimensions of you in the virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE! Join an amazing 3D experience where you can make friends, chat and dress up in thousands of unique items! Decorate and design your home, visit dreamlike locations, be anyone, meet everyone and explore a world of limitless creativity.

Play a 3D mobile role-playing game with endless possibilities!

Avakin Life’s virtual universe lets you become the person you’ve always wanted to be.

Create an avatar as unique as you and join more than 200 million players from around the world. Enjoy weekly events and non-stop parties. Go on exciting adventures and grab daily rewards. There’s always something new to do. Who will you be today? Download to find out!

Avakin Life lets you show the world your creativity. Dress your avatar in the latest virtual fashions, then design your dream home – with dozens of apartments, mansions, space shuttles and more to choose from. Discover amazing brands and create perfect outfits. Want to become a fashion star and show your designs? Jump into Fashion Contests then message your friends and party in paradise locations. Your Avakin. Your style. Your rules.

CREATE YOUR UNIQUE AVATAR
• Vast role-playing game where you can design your ideal character, figure, hair, eye colour and explore unlimited ways to be you!
• Dress your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and realise your wildest dreams. Anyone’s possible!
• Ever-changing virtual world that lets you express yourself and your style every day!

MEET REAL PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Join Avakins from all around the world and adventure together.
• Make new friends and build your crew!
• Show off perfect outfits and dress in the newest trends.
• Compete in exciting Fashion Contests and explore amazing brands and outfits!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share on Facebook or Instagram!

DEFINE YOUR STYLE
• Express yourself with 28,000+ Avakin clothing items and accessories. New outfits every week!
• Build your wardrobe with exclusive items and create collections packed with stylish looks.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion. Whatever your mood, there’s an outfit waiting to be discovered.
• Create unique looks with dresses, suits, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change hairstyles. Get a tattoo. Fly around in wings. Dress like a zombie! No barriers, no judgements.
• Become a fashion star and own the catwalk with dazzling poses that wow the crowds.

DESIGN THE PERFECT HOME
• From penthouses to castles. From the homes of your dreams to ones you’re yet to imagine. Create your perfect space then invite friends over.
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Host parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs. Chill with pets or explore outer space in your personalised shuttle. If you can dream it, you can do it.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual world where you can be anyone you want!
• Create a second life and live out endless adventures.
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion model and own your style.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Endless role-playing game with hundreds of exciting locations and ways to express your identity! Go to clubs, the beach, the stars and new places every week!
• Dive into the beautiful world of Avakin Life NOW!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Send questions, suggestions and ideas to https://avakin.com/community/

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/
descriptionShort: Meet new people and chat with friends in the largest 3D simulation game.

• Compete in exciting Fashion Contests and explore amazing brands and outfits!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share on Facebook or Instagram!

DEFINE YOUR STYLE
• Express yourself with 28,000+ Avakin clothing items and accessories. New outfits every week!
• Build your wardrobe with exclusive items and create collections packed with stylish looks.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion. Whatever your mood, there’s an outfit waiting to be discovered.
• Create unique looks with dresses, suits, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change hairstyles. Get a tattoo. Fly around in wings. Dress like a zombie! No barriers, no judgements.
• Become a fashion star and own the catwalk with dazzling poses that wow the crowds.

DESIGN THE PERFECT HOME
• From penthouses to castles. From the homes of your dreams to ones you’re yet to imagine. Create your perfect space then invite friends over.
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Host parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs. Chill with pets or explore outer space in your personalised shuttle. If you can dream it, you can do it.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual world where you can be anyone you want!
• Create a second life and live out endless adventures.
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion model and own your style.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Endless role-playing game with hundreds of exciting locations and ways to express your identity! Go to clubs, the beach, the stars and new places every week!
• Dive into the beautiful world of Avakin Life NOW!

Dress your avatar in the latest virtual fashions, then design your dream home – with dozens of apartments, mansions, space shuttles and more to choose from. Discover amazing brands and create perfect outfits. Want to become a fashion star and show your designs? Jump into Fashion Contests then message your friends and party in paradise locations. Your Avakin. Your style. Your rules.

CREATE YOUR UNIQUE AVATAR
• Vast role-playing game where you can design your ideal character, figure, hair, eye colour and explore unlimited ways to be you!
• Dress your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and realise your wildest dreams. Anyone’s possible!
• Ever-changing virtual world that lets you express yourself and your style every day!

MEET REAL PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Join Avakins from all around the world and adventure together.
• Make new friends and build your crew!
• Show off perfect outfits and dress in the newest trends.
• Compete in exciting Fashion Contests and explore amazing brands and outfits!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share on Facebook or Instagram!

DEFINE YOUR STYLE
• Express yourself with 28,000+ Avakin clothing items and accessories. New outfits every week!
• Build your wardrobe with exclusive items and create collections packed with stylish looks.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion. Whatever your mood, there’s an outfit waiting to be discovered.
• Create unique looks with dresses, suits, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change hairstyles. Get a tattoo. Fly around in wings. Dress like a zombie! No barriers, no judgements.
• Become a fashion star and own the catwalk with dazzling poses that wow the crowds.

DESIGN THE PERFECT HOME
• From penthouses to castles. From the homes of your dreams to ones you’re yet to imagine. Create your perfect space then invite friends over.
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Host parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs. Chill with pets or explore outer space in your personalised shuttle. If you can dream it, you can do it.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual world where you can be anyone you want!
• Create a second life and live out endless adventures.
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion model and own your style.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Endless role-playing game with hundreds of exciting locations and ways to express your identity! Go to clubs, the beach, the stars and new places every week!
• Dive into the beautiful world of Avakin Life NOW!

Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Antenna Media Centre
Beck Street
Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Discover new dimensions of you in the virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE! Join an amazing 3D experience where you can make friends, chat and dress up in thousands of unique items! Decorate and design your home, visit dreamlike locations, be anyone, meet everyone and explore a world of limitless creativity.

Play a 3D mobile role-playing game with endless possibilities!

Avakin Life’s virtual universe lets you become the person you’ve always wanted to be.

Create an avatar as unique as you and join millions of players from around the world. Enjoy weekly events and non-stop parties. Go on exciting adventures and grab daily rewards. There’s always something new to do. Who will you be today? Download to find out!

Avakin Life lets you show the world your creativity. Dress your avatar in the latest virtual fashions, then design your dream home – with dozens of apartments, mansions, space shuttles and more to choose from. Discover amazing brands and create perfect outfits. Want to become a fashion star and show your designs? Jump into Fashion Contests then message your friends and party in paradise locations. Your Avakin. Your style. Your rules.

CREATE YOUR UNIQUE AVATAR
• Vast role-playing game where you can design your ideal character, figure, hair, eye colour and explore unlimited ways to be you!
• Dress your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and realise your wildest dreams. Anyone’s possible!
• Ever-changing virtual world that lets you express yourself and your style every day!

MEET REAL PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Join Avakins from all around the world and adventure together.
• Make new friends and build your crew!
• Show off perfect outfits and dress in the newest trends.
• Compete in exciting Fashion Contests and explore amazing brands and outfits!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share on Facebook or Instagram!

DEFINE YOUR STYLE
• Express yourself with 28,000+ Avakin clothing items and accessories. New outfits every week!
• Build your wardrobe with exclusive items and create collections packed with stylish looks.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion. Whatever your mood, there’s an outfit waiting to be discovered.
• Create unique looks with dresses, suits, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery and millions of other clothing items and accessories.
• Change hairstyles. Get a tattoo. Fly around in wings. Dress like a zombie! No barriers, no judgements.
• Become a fashion star and own the catwalk with dazzling poses that wow the crowds.

DESIGN THE PERFECT HOME
• From penthouses to castles. From the homes of your dreams to ones you’re yet to imagine. Create your perfect space then invite friends over.
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Host parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs. Chill with pets or explore outer space in your personalised shuttle. If you can dream it, you can do it.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual world where you can be anyone you want!
• Create a second life and live out endless adventures.
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion model and own your style.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Endless role-playing game with hundreds of exciting locations and ways to express your identity! Go to clubs, the beach, the stars and new places every week!
• Dive into the beautiful world of Avakin Life NOW!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Send questions, suggestions and ideas to https://avakin.com/community/

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/
descriptionShort: Meet new people and chat with friends in the largest 3D simulation game.

appDetails.developerAddress:
Lockwood Publishing Ltd
Antenna Media Centre

Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Live your soft life…Enjoy more cottagecore adventures and write your story in the lush Garden Valley - Avakin's stunning new world. From laid-back looks to unique moments, get swept away in a story like no other. Nell is waiting for you…
• Bugs that were causing issues for some players have been fixed.

Create an avatar as unique as you and join players from around the world. Enjoy weekly events and non-stop parties. Go on adventures and grab daily rewards. There’s always something new to do. Who will you be today? Download to find out!

Avakin Life lets you show the world your creativity. Dress your avatar in the latest virtual fashions, then design your dream home – with apartments, mansions, space shuttles and more to choose from. Discover amazing brands and create your favorite outfit. Want to become a fashion star and show your designs? Jump into Fashion Contests then message your friends and party in paradise locations. Your Avakin. Your style. Your rules.

CREATE YOUR UNIQUE AVATAR
• Role-playing game where you can design your ideal character, figure, hair, eye colour and explore unlimited ways to be you!
• Dress your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and realise your wildest dreams. Anyone’s possible!
• A virtual world that lets you express yourself and your style every day!

MEET REAL PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Join Avakins from all around the world and adventure together.
• Make new friends and build your crew!
• Show off perfect outfits and dress in the newest trends.
• Compete in Fashion Contests and explore brands and outfits!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share on Facebook or Instagram!

DEFINE YOUR STYLE
• Express yourself with 28,000+ Avakin clothing items and accessories. New outfits every week!
• Build your wardrobe and create collections packed with stylish looks.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion. Whatever your mood, there’s an outfit waiting to be discovered.
• Create unique looks with dresses, suits, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery, clothing items and accessories.
• Change hairstyles. Get a tattoo. Fly around in wings. Dress like a zombie! No barriers, no judgements.
• Become a fashion star and own the catwalk with dazzling poses that wow the crowds.

DESIGN YOUR DREAM-HOME
• From penthouses to castles. From the homes of your dreams to ones you’re yet to imagine. Create your own space then invite friends over.
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Host parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs. Chill with pets or explore outer space in your personalised shuttle.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual world where you can be anyone you want!
• Create a second life and live adventures.
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion model and own your style.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role-playing game with hundreds of locations and ways to express your identity! Go to clubs, the beach, the stars and new places every week!
• Dive into the world of Avakin Life now!

FOLLOW US:
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
instagram.com/avakinofficial/
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD

Lockwood Publishing would love to hear your suggestions & feedback on how to improve our game!
Send questions, suggestions and ideas to https://avakin.com/community/

Visit us at http://www.avakin.com/
descriptionShort: Meet new people and chat with friends in the virtual world of AVAKIN LIFE!

• Show off perfect outfits and dress in the newest trends.
• Compete in Fashion Contests and explore brands and outfits!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share on Facebook or Instagram!

DEFINE YOUR STYLE
• Express yourself with 28,000+ Avakin clothing items and accessories. New outfits every week!
• Build your wardrobe and create collections packed with stylish looks.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion. Whatever your mood, there’s an outfit waiting to be discovered.
• Create unique looks with dresses, suits, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery, clothing items and accessories.
• Change hairstyles. Get a tattoo. Fly around in wings. Dress like a zombie! No barriers, no judgements.
• Become a fashion star and own the catwalk with dazzling poses that wow the crowds.

DESIGN YOUR DREAM-HOME
• From penthouses to castles. From the homes of your dreams to ones you’re yet to imagine. Create your own space then invite friends over.
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Host parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs. Chill with pets or explore outer space in your personalised shuttle.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual world where you can be anyone you want!
• Create a second life and live adventures.
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion model and own your style.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role-playing game with hundreds of locations and ways to express your identity! Go to clubs, the beach, the stars and new places every week!
• Dive into the world of Avakin Life now!

Play a 3D mobile role-playing game!

Avakin Life’s virtual universe lets you become the person you’ve always wanted to be.

Create an avatar as unique as you and join players from around the world. Enjoy weekly events and non-stop parties. Go on adventures and grab daily rewards. There’s always something new to do. Who will you be today? Download to find out!

Avakin Life lets you show the world your creativity. Dress your avatar in the latest virtual fashions, then design your dream home – with apartments, mansions, space shuttles and more to choose from. Discover amazing brands and create your favorite outfit. Want to become a fashion star and show your designs? Jump into Fashion Contests then message your friends and party in paradise locations. Your Avakin. Your style. Your rules.

CREATE YOUR UNIQUE AVATAR
• Role-playing game where you can design your ideal character, figure, hair, eye colour and explore unlimited ways to be you!
• Dress your avatar how you want. Go cute or crazy - pick your favourite style and realise your wildest dreams. Anyone’s possible!
• A virtual world that lets you express yourself and your style every day!

MEET REAL PEOPLE AND CHAT
• Join Avakins from all around the world and adventure together.
• Make new friends and build your crew!
• Show off perfect outfits and dress in the newest trends.
• Compete in Fashion Contests and explore brands and outfits!
• Take pictures of your avatar and share on Facebook or Instagram!

DEFINE YOUR STYLE
• Express yourself with 28,000+ Avakin clothing items and accessories. New outfits every week!
• Build your wardrobe and create collections packed with stylish looks.
• Dress up (or down), play with your style and amaze others with your sense of fashion. Whatever your mood, there’s an outfit waiting to be discovered.
• Create unique looks with dresses, suits, shoes, skirts, bags, jewellery, clothing items and accessories.
• Change hairstyles. Get a tattoo. Fly around in wings. Dress like a zombie! No barriers, no judgements.
• Become a fashion star and own the catwalk with dazzling poses that wow the crowds.

DESIGN YOUR DREAM-HOME
• From penthouses to castles. From the homes of your dreams to ones you’re yet to imagine. Create your own space then invite friends over.
• Decorate your home how you want - modern, classic, Hollywood style – whatever suits your mood or the latest fashion trends.
• Host parties or just spend some quality time with your BFFs. Chill with pets or explore outer space in your personalised shuttle.

THE 3D SIMULATION GAME
• 3D virtual world where you can be anyone you want!
• Create a second life and live adventures.
• Choose your look, clothes and accessories.
• Become a fashion model and own your style.
• Message friends and be the centre of attention.
• Dress up, discover new brands and shop for stylish outfits.
• Role-playing game with hundreds of locations and ways to express your identity! Go to clubs, the beach, the stars and new places every week!
• Dive into the world of Avakin Life now!

Discover unlimited ways to be you. Enter a virtual world of endless opportunities, a wardrobe packed with the latest fashion, your dream home in every location imaginable, and new adventures, parties and events happening every day!
This is YOUR life as you want to live it. A world where self-expression is boundless. A virtual universe connecting people from everywhere around the world. Don’t wait to experience unlimited ways to be you!

Create an avatar as unique as ✨YOU✨
• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.
_________________
Follow us at
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
Instagram @avakinofficial
TikTok @avakinlife_official
_________________

container.value:
Lockwood Publishing Ltd
Antenna Media Centre
Beck Street
Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Start a life without limits in Avakin Life now!

Discover unlimited ways to be you. Enter a virtual world of endless opportunities, a wardrobe packed with the latest fashion, your dream home in every location imaginable, and new adventures, parties and events happening every day!
This is YOUR life as you want to live it. A world where self-expression is boundless. A virtual universe connecting people from everywhere around the world. Don’t wait to experience unlimited ways to be you!

Create an avatar as unique as ✨YOU✨
• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.
_________________
Follow us at
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
Instagram @avakinofficial
TikTok @avakinlife_official
_________________

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

container.value:
Lockwood Publishing Ltd
Antenna Media Centre
Beck Street
Nottingham
NG1 1EQ
United Kingdom

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Share your voice with the world and experience The Voice like never before.
Start a life without limits in Avakin Life now!

Discover unlimited ways to be you. Enter a virtual world of endless opportunities, a wardrobe packed with the latest fashion, your dream home in every location imaginable, and new adventures, parties and events happening every day!
This is YOUR life as you want to live it. A world where self-expression is boundless. A virtual universe connecting people from everywhere around the world. Don’t wait to experience unlimited ways to be you!

Create an avatar as unique as ✨YOU✨
• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.
_________________
Follow us at
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
Instagram @avakinofficial
TikTok @avakinlife_official
_________________

title: Avakin Life - 3D Metaverse

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Start a life without limits in Avakin Life now!

Discover unlimited ways to be you. Enter a virtual world of endless opportunities, a wardrobe packed with the latest fashion, your dream home in every location imaginable, and new adventures, parties and events happening every day!
This is YOUR life as you want to live it. A world where self-expression is boundless. A virtual universe connecting people from everywhere around the world. Don’t wait to experience unlimited ways to be you!

Create an avatar as unique as ✨YOU✨
• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.
_________________
Follow us at
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
Instagram @avakinofficial
TikTok @avakinlife_official
_________________

This is YOUR life as you want to live it. A world where self-expression is boundless. A virtual universe connecting people from everywhere around the world. Don’t wait to experience unlimited ways to be you!

Create an avatar as unique as ✨YOU✨
• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.
_________________
Follow us at
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
Instagram @avakinofficial
TikTok @avakinlife_official

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Start a life without limits in Avakin Life now!

Discover unlimited ways to be you. Enter a virtual world of endless opportunities, a wardrobe packed with the latest fashion, your dream home in every location imaginable, and new adventures, parties and events happening every day!
This is YOUR life as you want to live it. A world where self-expression is boundless. A virtual universe connecting people from everywhere around the world. Don’t wait to experience unlimited ways to be you!

Create an avatar as unique as ✨YOU✨
• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.

• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.

• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.
_________________
Follow us at

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Join Avakin Life with no limits! Enter a virtual world where you can be anything and anyone. This world is what you make it.

Create your avatar as unique as You, select clothes and accessories from endless fashion styles, and express your personality with the coolest animations. Then you are ready to go to hang out with your friends in incredible places or meet new people at parties.

💛Join the community 💬

Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community. Go to parties, live events, and clubs every night, or hang out in a Plaza or a Café if you are looking for relaxation. Create videos and photos and share your creativity with your friends. You can have a privet conversation or jump into a group chat where you can share your adventures.

👗Define your style🧵

Hair, makeup, accessories, clothes, shoes, apartments, spaceships, pets - there are endless ways to express your look. Customize your 3D avatar how you like. Be yourself, or who you want to be.

🏡Build your dream home📐

Design perfect spaces and homes of dreams for yourself and for your pet. Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

🌏Begin your adventure🚀

Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.

🌟Join the VIP Club!✨

Enjoy exclusive discounts, badges, hangouts, and styles all wrapped up in a handy monthly plan. Choose from three tiers of membership and experience ultimate luxury now!

A monthly purchase will be applied to your iTunes account on confirmation. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. For more information, see our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.


Follow us at

Twitter @LockwoodLKWD
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
Instagram @avakinofficial
TikTok @avakinlife_official

title: Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Step away from your exhausting day-to-day life and play your dream.
Imagine being a model on a catwalk or part of a K-pop band, designing your luxury apartment and wearing the latest designer outfits every day, or even experiencing the life of a spunky teenager. This world is what you make it.

✨Customize your look✨
You can pick from thousands of clothes, hairstyles, make-up, body shapes, and facial features. You can be a rockstar one day and a cheerleader the next or just grab a dino costume if you wish. Express your personality with your style and animations. Be a dancer or walk like a zombie, all the possibilities are there to explore.

🌟Meet with friends🌟
Whether you’d rather go to the beach or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with your friends. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA, or relax in the Amazon rainforest. Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options. Spend time with your virtual family and have memorable moments.

🏛️Design your home🏛️
Do you fancy living under the sea or designing your dream home above the sky? Build your dream home and make it happen. You can even level up your apartment by design puzzles, mazes, races, and more for your friends with Buildly feature.

👑Join the VIP Club👑
Join the VIP Club, which gives you monthly rewards, a special badge, styles, and MORE. Enjoy hanging out in the specially designed VIP Lounge and experience ultimate luxury.

A monthly purchase will be applied to your iTunes account on confirmation. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. For more information, see our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

title:
Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World
1.087.02

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Enter Avakin Life virtual metaverse and experience a vibrant world where you can live the life you've always dreamed of! Customize your own avatar, design your dream home, chat and meet your friends, and socialize with millions of players from around the world. Dive into a 3D metaverse filled with endless possibilities. Are you ready to explore, create, and be whoever you want to be?

🌟 CREATE YOUR UNIQUE AVATAR 🌟
Choose from a vast selection of hairstyles, outfits, and accessories to create a one-of-a-kind avatar that reflects your style. Express yourself with fashion, tattoos, and animations. Make a statement and stand out in the crowd!

🤝 SOCIALIZE AND MAKE FRIENDS 🤝
Avakin Life is all about connecting with people. Chat, interact and make new friends from all around the world. Join special events, parties, and social gatherings to meet like-minded individuals. Spend time with your virtual family and have memorable moments.

🏠 DESIGN YOUR DREAM HOME 🏠
Design and decorate your ideal home in Avakin Life. Choose from a wide range of furniture and décor items to make your space truly your own. From cozy apartments to extravagant mansions, the choice is yours! Host parties and invite friends to show off your interior design skills.

💃 EXPRESS YOURSELF THROUGH FASHION 💃
Avakin Life offers an extensive wardrobe with thousands of outfits, hairstyles, and accessories. Stay on-trend with regular updates and express your unique style. Show off your fashion sense by participating in fashion contests and events.

🌆 EXPLORE A VIBRANT WORLD 🌆
Immerse yourself in a 3D virtual world filled with exciting places to visit. Explore beautifully designed locales like the popular Club Sundown, trendy Avakin Plaza, and the tranquil Zen Garden. Discover hidden treasures, meet new friends, and embark on adventures.

🎉 HOST EPIC PARTIES 🎉
Become the ultimate party host by throwing unforgettable events in your stylish Avakin home. Invite your friends, chat, and party the night away. Show off your DJ skills or just dance to the beat of your favorite tunes. The nightlife in Avakin Life is always buzzing!

⭐️ Join the VIP Club⭐️
VIP Club gives you monthly rewards, a special badge, styles, and MORE. Enjoy hanging out in the specially designed VIP Lounge and experience ultimate luxury.
A monthly purchase will be applied to your iTunes account on confirmation. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. For more information, see our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Avakin Life is more than just a metaverse game; it's a virtual second life where you can be whoever you want to be. Join millions of players and start your journey today! Download Avakin Life now and let the adventure begin. Explore, create, chat, and live your dream life!

📣 Follow Us:
Facebook: facebook.com/AvakinOfficial
Instagram: instagram.com/avakinofficial
Twitter: twitter.com/AvakinOfficial

NOTE: Avakin Life is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased with real money. An Internet connection is required to play. Age restrictions apply.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.

title:
Avakin Life - 3D Virtual World
2.000.00

creator: Lockwood Publishing Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Start a life without limits in Avakin Life now!

Discover unlimited ways to be you. Enter a virtual world of endless opportunities, a wardrobe packed with the latest fashion, your dream home in every location imaginable, and new adventures, parties and events happening every day!
This is YOUR life as you want to live it. A world where self-expression is boundless. A virtual universe connecting people from everywhere around the world. Don’t wait to experience unlimited ways to be you!

Create an avatar as unique as ✨YOU✨
• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.
_________________
Follow us at
Twitter @LockwoodLKWD
facebook.com/AvakinOfficial/
Instagram @avakinofficial
TikTok @avakinlife_official
_________________

Create an avatar as unique as ✨YOU✨
• Decide how to represent yourself. A reflection of reality or your wildest dreams?
• Customise your look with thousands of hairstyles, make-up, and facial features.
• Express your personality with animations. Walk like a zombie or strut like a model - you decide.

Define your ⚡style.⚡
• Stay ahead of trends with weekly fashion drops.
• Whatever your aesthetic, whatever the occasion, create a look that suits you with 30k+ fashion items.
• Make a statement with head-turning accessories from cute hats to beautiful wings.
• Dress to impress in red-carpet glamour, style with attitude in streetwear ‘fits, or make a statement in alternative fashion. Experiment and discover your unique style!
- Share your style and snap pics for Facebook and Instagram.

Build your dream 💖home.💖
• From tropical islands to city penthouses, the home of your dreams is waiting to be discovered.
• Scandi chic or vamp lair? Decorate to your tastes with themed furniture collections.
• Create a home for your pet whether it’s a cute corgi or fierce dragon?
• Host parties with all your friends or create the perfect night in. Your place, your rules!

Meet new 🌟friends.🌟
• Whether you’d rather go on a cottagecore picnic or spend Saturday night at the rock club, hang out and chat with new friends in hundreds of amazing locations.
• Find your virtual family and make lasting friendships in our welcoming community.

Join the 💕community.💕
• Share your looks and win prizes in the Fashion Contest.
• Participate together in weekly events and collect unique rewards.
• Attend parties, live music, and club events every night.
• Create videos and photos and share your creativity with other Avakins.

Begin your 🚀adventure. 🚀
• Explore with no limits. Travel to outer space, road trip across the USA or relax in the Amazon rainforest.
• Live your roleplay life in epic locations with endless costume and animation options.
• Get involved in gripping stories. Join the community to unpack mysteries and complete quests for unique rewards.
